title: Hadashi de Waltz wo
sinopse:
1. Hadashi de Waltz (Barefoot Waltz)
2. Koko e Oide (Come Here)
3. Good Sky Sunny Day
4. Cowardly Hand
5. Sayonara, Fuyu no Hi (Goodbye, Winter Days)
6. Kono Te wo Totte (Take My Hand)
7. Doushitara Ii, Kono Koi wo (What Should I Do With This Love?)
8. Natsukaze (Summer Cold)
